item.title: DOGE’s $1 spending card limit touches everything from military research to trash pickup
item.description: The crackdown on routine expenses is part of a campaign by the president and Elon Musk to reset the scope and mission of America’s sprawling bureaucra...

item.title: Ronald to Donald: Trump’s moves highlight the GOP shift away from Reagan
item.description: With heavy tariffs and overtures to Russia, Trump embraces a worldview starkly different from that of the conservative icon.

item.title: Trump touted sweeping tariff, DOGE plans — then adjusted as backlash grew
item.description: Adjustments on DOGE, tariffs suggest the president isn’t immune to political pressure, despite the scale of his proposals

item.title: Trump’s speech showed Democrats at low ebb. A comeback will take work.
item.description: Democrats are seeking cohesion in their opposition to President Donald Trump and a message that resonates with voters.

item.title: Walz, reflecting on 2024 race, says Democrats played it ‘too safe’
item.description: Tim Walz, the Democratic vice-presidential nominee in 2024, says the party’s campaign strategy was too cautious and didn’t resonate with voters.
